meta.title: WaiWai — AI агенты для автоматизации продаж и маркетинга
meta.description: AI агенты для автоматизации продаж и маркетинга. Увеличиваем продажи на 21%, сокращаем рутину на 41%. Интеллектуальные агенты для email-рассылок, CRM, маркетплейсов и социальных сетей.

hero.title: Artificial Intelligence that truly understands your business
hero.subtitle: Find leads, send them personalized messages, and manage conversations. Free up resources for business growth while AI handles the routine

leads.title: WaiWai Leads
leads.description: Lead sourcing and enrichment: data sources, verification, scoring, deduplication.

outreach.title: WaiWai Outreach
outreach.description: Personalized outreach and meeting booking (email / Telegram / LinkedIn).

pricing.title: Pricing

enterprise.name: Enterprise
enterprise.description: Custom architecture aligned with your compliance and security
features: Deployment inside private clouds or on-prem environments
Integrations with corporate CRM and BI stacks
Dedicated WaiWai project squad and executive sponsor

pricing.footnote: DICH is an internal currency. Enriching a contact costs 1 DICH; sending a message through one channel uses 0.5 DICH. You can purchase extra DICH within any plan, and unused DICH rolls over to the next month.

egor.name: Egor Lukin
egor.description: Full-stack software engineer with 10 years of experience. Worked at Evil Martians, Aviasales, Dualboot, and early-stage startups. Launched his own SaaS products.

pavel.name: Pavel Kalashnikov
pavel.description: 13 years in commercial development, led large LMS, HoReCa, and media projects. Open-source enthusiast.

anastasiaM.name: Anastasia Moshina
anastasiaM.description: Ruby on Rails developer who helped build large fintech products. Over five years of engineering experience.

aleksey.name: Alexey Pavlov
aleksey.description: Former editor-in-chief at Sostav with 12 years in journalism and PR.

vyacheslav.name: Vyacheslav Ermolenko
vyacheslav.description: Eight years designing digital products. Led design teams and crafted design systems for fintech, Web3, business, and cultural projects.

anastasiaS.name: Anastasia Soboleva
anastasiaS.description: Full-stack QA engineer with 5+ years of experience. Helps teams ship stable, user-friendly products by catching critical issues before release.

mik.name: Mik Wiseman
mik.description: Founder of WaiWai, launched nine startups; graduate of the MSU Faculty of Computational Mathematics and Cybernetics and winner of international AI hackathons.

waiComputer.name: Wai Computer
waiComputer.description: Twelve years of uninterrupted work without vacations or sick days. Speaks every programming language at once, occasionally freezes on Zoom calls, dreams of a promotion to a quantum computer.

stats.timeFreed: Recruiters' time freed up for other tasks

falcone.title: Falcone
falcone.description: Found clients for delivery service - Ozon, Wildberries, Yandex Market sellers. WaiWai sent personalized emails using open data about customers and their needs.

akBarsBank.title: Ak Bars Bank
akBarsBank.description: Automated the recruitment process on HeadHunter. For employee search, WaiWai creates personalized letters based on candidate profiles. The system sorts incoming requests and responds to them, saving recruiters' time.

ontico.title: Ontico Conferences
ontico.description: For selling tickets to the Berlin conference, WaiWai found programmers by programming language and attendance at similar events. Selecting relevant leads and personalized messages increased conversion by 2.4 times.

kodix.title: Kodix
kodix.description: Helped a custom dev studio enter the Saudi market and find new clients in Russia. WaiWai’s sales agent automated LinkedIn outreach with decision-makers at dealerships and auto brands.

cta.title: While competitors are looking for clients - yours are already reading messages from WaiWai
